description: This file contains utility functions for printing chat history and team memories, utilizing rich library for formatted console output, and references external schemas and response classes.

methods.name: print_chat_history
methods.description: Prints the chat history of a team session in a formatted panel.

methods.name: render_panel
methods.description: Creates a rich Panel object with JSON content and a title.

methods.name: print_team_memory
methods.description: Prints the memories of a user in a formatted panel.
